info.title: DabApp Admin API
info.description: Documentation de l'API Admin avec Swagger

description.example: Organized track riding events for all levels

get.summary: Admin: Get event category by id
Admin: Get all events with filters

post.summary: Admin: Create a new event with all relations

organizer_profile_id.description: ID of the organizer profile (Admin only)

put.summary: Admin: Update an event with all relations

get.summary: Admin: Get participants for an event
Admin: Get tickets for an event

post.summary: Admin: Create a ticket pool for an event

get.summary: Admin: Get updates for an event

post.summary: Admin: Post a new update for an event

content.example: The event start time has changed.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (published, draft, sold, etc)

post.summary: Create listing on behalf of a user

requestBody.description:
Listing Data & Examples
Create a listing in a single step. Select the correct payload for the category.

🟢 EXAMPLE 1: MOTORCYCLE (With Submission Enabled)
{ 'user_id': 2, 'category_id': 1, 'country_id': 1, 'city_id': 50, 'title': 'Ducati Panigale V4', 'allow_submission': true, 'minimum_bid': 50000, 'contacting_channel': 'phone', 'brand_id': 5, 'model_id': 120, 'year_id': 2024, 'engine': '1103cc', 'mileage': 5000, 'body_condition': 'As New', 'images': ['https://url.com/img1.jpg'] }
🟢 EXAMPLE 2: SPARE PART (Category 2)
{ 'user_id': 2, 'category_id': 2, 'country_id': 1, 'city_id': 50, 'title': 'Akrapovic Exhaust', 'price': 12000, 'contacting_channel': 'chat', 'bike_part_category_id': 3, 'condition': 'new', 'motorcycles': [{'brand_id': 5, 'model_id': 120, 'year_id': 2023}], 'images': ['https://url.com/part.jpg'] }
🟢 EXAMPLE 3: LICENSE PLATE (Category 3)
{ 'user_id': 2, 'category_id': 3, 'country_id': 1, 'city_id': 50, 'title': 'Dubai A 123', 'price': 250000, 'contacting_channel': 'both', 'plate_format_id': 5, 'fields': [{'field_id': 10, 'value': 'A'}, {'field_id': 11, 'value': '123'}] }

is_seller.description: True if authenticated user is the seller

post.description: Deletes existing images and recreates them in the provided order to reset IDs/sequence.

image_ids.description: Array of image IDs in desired order

get.summary: Search users by name or phone

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search string (Phone, First Name, or Last Name)

get.summary: Get admin menu tree for authenticated user
get.description: Returns the complete menu tree filtered by user permissions and roles. Menus are cached for 1 hour per user.

parameters.name: force_refresh
parameters.description: Clear cache and fetch fresh data

post.description: Creates a new menu item (parent or child) with all available properties

get.description: Returns all menus without permission filtering. For admin management purposes.
Returns a single menu item with its children and all properties

put.description: Updates an existing menu item with any of the available properties

delete.description: Deletes a menu item and all its children (cascade delete)

post.description: Updates the order of multiple menu items at once
Delete multiple menu items at once

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all notifications sent to users, including read status

post.summary: Send mass notifications to filtered users

user_ids.description: List of User IDs for direct notification

get.description: Retrieve list of notification preferences with pagination

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Items per page (leave empty for all)

post.summary: Create default preferences for a user
post.description: Useful if a user hasn't logged in yet and has no preferences record

patch.summary: Enable all notifications for a user
Disable all notifications for a user

post.summary: Enable ALL notifications for ALL users
Disable ALL notifications for ALL users
Disable a category of notifications for ALL users

get.summary: Admin: Get all organizers with pagination and search

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Items per page (leave empty for all)

post.description: Creates a prospect user. Optionally creates a listing if listing details are provided.

delete.description: Deletes the prospect and their listings

post.summary: Create SOOM on behalf of user

user_id.description: User ID (Buyer) to place the bid for

amount.description: Bid amount. Must be higher than current highest + increment.

note.example: Admin placed bid for VIP client via phone call

isOverbidding.description: True if this bid is >150% of the previous highest bid

get.summary: Liste tous les guides avec filtres avancés (Admin)
get.description: Récupère la liste de tous les guides avec possibilité de filtrer, trier et paginer. Si per_page est vide, retourne tous les résultats sans pagination.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Numéro de page pour la pagination

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Nombre d'éléments par page. Laisser vide pour retourner TOUS les résultats sans pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Recherche dans le titre, l'excerpt et le contenu des guides

200.description: Liste des guides récupérée avec succès

excerpt.example: Everything you need to know about keeping your bike in top condition.

excerpt_ar.example: كل ما تحتاج معرفته للحفاظ على دراجتك في أفضل حالة.

meta_description.example: Learn how to maintain your motorcycle like a pro.

post.description: Crée un nouveau guide avec toutes ses informations. Le slug est généré automatiquement depuis le titre.

excerpt.example: Everything you need to know about keeping your bike in top condition.

excerpt_ar.example: كل ما تحتاج معرفته للحفاظ على دراجتك في أفضل حالة.

meta_description.example: Learn how to maintain your motorcycle like a pro.

meta_description_ar.example: تعلم كيفية صيانة دراجتك النارية بمهارة.

excerpt.example: Everything you need to know about keeping your bike in top condition.

excerpt_ar.example: كل ما تحتاج معرفته للحفاظ على دراجتك في أفضل حالة.

items.example: The selected category id is invalid.

get.description: Retourne des statistiques complètes sur tous les guides : compteurs, top auteurs, catégories populaires, guides les plus consultés, etc.

top_authors.description: Top 5 des auteurs les plus productifs

top_categories.description: Top 5 des catégories les plus utilisées

most_viewed_guides.description: Top 5 des guides les plus consultés

most_liked_guides.description: Top 5 des guides les plus likés

guides_by_month.description: Nombre de guides créés par mois (12 derniers mois)

get.description: Récupère tous les détails d'un guide incluant le contenu complet, les sections, images et commentaires récents

200.description: Détails du guide récupérés avec succès

excerpt.example: Everything you need to know about keeping your bike in top condition.

excerpt_ar.example: كل ما تحتاج معرفته للحفاظ على دراجتك في أفضل حالة.

content.example: Regular oil changes are crucial for engine longevity...

content_ar.example: تغيير الزيت بانتظام أمر بالغ الأهمية لطول عمر المحرك...

meta_description.example: Learn how to maintain your motorcycle like a pro.

put.description: Met à jour un guide existant. Tous les champs sont optionnels. Si le titre change, le slug est régénéré automatiquement.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID du guide à mettre à jour

requestBody.description: Données à mettre à jour (tous les champs sont optionnels)

tags.description: New tags (replaces old ones)

200.description: Guide mis à jour avec succès

data.description: Guide mis à jour avec toutes ses relations

delete.description: Supprime définitivement un guide et toutes ses relations (tags, sections, images, commentaires, likes). Cette action est irréversible.

post.description: Change le statut d'un guide. Si le statut passe à 'published' pour la première fois, la date de publication est définie automatiquement.

published_at.description: Date de publication (null si non publié)

post.description: Supprime plusieurs guides en une seule opération. Toutes les relations (tags, sections, images, commentaires, likes) sont également supprimées. Cette action est irréversible.

requestBody.description: Liste des IDs des guides à supprimer

ids.description: Tableau des IDs de guides à supprimer (minimum 1, recommandé max 100)

post.description: Change le statut de plusieurs guides en une seule opération. Si le statut devient 'published', la date de publication est définie pour tous les guides concernés.

requestBody.description: Liste des IDs et nouveau statut

ids.description: Tableau des IDs de guides à modifier

status.description: Nouveau statut à appliquer à tous les guides

get.description: Récupère tous les commentaires d'un guide spécifique avec les informations des utilisateurs

200.description: Liste des commentaires récupérée avec succès

comments.description: Liste de tous les commentaires triés du plus récent au plus ancien

content.example: Excellent guide, très utile pour les débutants!

get.description: Récupère toutes les catégories avec le nombre de guides. Si per_page est vide, retourne tout sans pagination.

delete.description: Supprime une catégorie. Les guides associés auront category_id = NULL

get.description: Récupère la liste de tous les commentaires avec filtres. Si per_page est vide, retourne tous les résultats.
Récupère tous les tags avec le nombre de guides associés

delete.summary: Supprimer tous les tags non utilisés (Admin)

get.summary: Liste tous les tags de POI (Admin)
get.description: Récupère tous les tags avec le nombre de POIs associés

put.summary: Mettre à jour un tag de POI (Admin)

post.summary: Suppression en masse de tags de POI (Admin)

delete.summary: Supprimer tous les tags de POI non utilisés (Admin)

parameters.name: report_type_id
parameters.description: Filter by Report Type ID (e.g., 1 for Guide)

post.summary: Refresh JWT access token using refresh token

Get all banners (ADMIN - sorted by order)

200.description: List of all banners with pagination

put.summary: Update the global licence plate price

price.description: New global price for licence plates

post.summary: Create a new motorcycle pricing rule

get.summary: Get a specific motorcycle pricing rule

post.summary: Create a new sparepart pricing rule

get.summary: Get a specific sparepart pricing rule

post.summary: Check promo code validity and calculate discount
post.description: Validates a promo code and calculates the new price after applying the discount.

200.description: Promo code is valid and discount applied

403.description: Promo code is not valid (time, price, usage limit)

message.example: Promo code is not valid at this time.

404.description: Promo code not found or inactive

message.example: Promo code not found or inactive.

items.example: The total price must be at least 0.

get.description: Returns a list of all promo code usage records with associated user and listing details.
Get list of promo codes marked for display (e.g. for mobile app).

patch.description: Enable or disable the display of a promo code in public listings.

get.summary: Get chat session details with messages (Admin)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (active, cancelled, expired, trial)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all subscription plans, including inactive ones.

description.example: Standard flatbed towing service suitable for most cars.

description_ar.example: خدمة سطحة عادية مناسبة لمعظم السيارات.

get.summary: Get paginated list of users with filters
get.description: Returns paginated list of users. Supports search, filtering by role, active status, verification status, country, and custom sorting.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by first name, last name, email, or phone

post.description: Creates a new user account. Auto-generates a password and sends it via email to the user.

get.summary: Get complete user details by ID
get.description: Returns detailed user information including role, country, bank cards, wishlists, listings, payments, sooms sent/received, and comprehensive statistics.

put.description: Updates user information. All fields are optional. Only provided fields will be updated.

delete.description: Soft deletes a user (can be restored later). User data is retained but marked as deleted.
Permanently deletes a user from the database. This action cannot be undone.

post.description: Restores a previously soft-deleted user account.

message.example: Password reset successfully and email sent

get.summary: Get user's listings with complete details
get.description: Returns all listings of a specific user with complete details including images, category-specific data, and statistics
Returns detailed statistics about users, including total counts, active status, verification status, registration completion, and counts by role/country.

post.summary: Perform bulk actions on multiple users
post.description: Execute actions (activate, deactivate, delete, verify, assign role) on multiple users at once

user_ids.description: Array of user IDs to perform action on

email_message.example: Hello, this is an important message...

get.description: Returns paginated list of soft-deleted users with their role and country information

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 15, max: 100)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email or phone

error.example: You don't have permission to view trashed users

items.example: The per page must not be greater than 100.

get.description: Returns paginated authentication logs. Supports filtering by user, date range, online status, and searching.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by user name or email

get.summary: Get authentication logs for a specific user
get.description: Returns all authentication logs for a specific user with statistics

post.summary: Assign a POI to a user (makes the user a dealer)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID to become owner of the POI

User.title: User
User.description: User model representing a user in the system

profile_picture.description: URL or path to user's profile picture

verified.description: Whether the user's account is verified

is_active.description: Whether the user's account is active

is_online.description: Whether the user is currently online

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the user was last updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the user was soft deleted (null if not deleted)
